inclusion.criterion: Using daily insulin therapy for at least one year
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Uninterrupted internet access while study system is being used overnight and for upload of study data in the morning
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Diabetic ketoacidosis in the past 6 months
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: History of seizure disorder (except for hypoglycemic seizure)
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Current use of oral/inhaled glucocorticoids, beta-blockers or other medications
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: The patient has type 1 diabetes and is using daily insulin therapy. He does not have a history of seizure disorder or heart disease.
